200.description: Return a welcome message and links to the API documentation.

get.summary: Welcome to the Overture Maps API

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude coordinate. Required if country code is not provided.

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: Longitude coordinate. Required if country code is not provided.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Search radius in meters, defaulting to 1000 meters if not provided.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO 3166 country code consisting of 2 characters. Required if lat/lng are not provided.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit on the number of results returned, defaulting to 100 if not provided.

parameters.name: brand_wikidata
parameters.description: Wikidata brand ID associated with the place.

parameters.name: brand_name
parameters.description: Brand name associated with the place.

parameters.name: min_confidence
parameters.description: Minimum confidence score for the places to be returned, defaulting to 0.5 if not provided.

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: Array of category names, provided as a comma-separated string.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Response format, defaulting to JSON. Options are "json", "csv", or "geojson".

get.summary: Get all Places using Query params as filters

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO 3166 country code consisting of 2 characters. Required if lat/lng are not provided.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude coordinate. Required if country code is not provided.

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: Longitude coordinate. Required if country code is not provided.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Search radius in meters, defaulting to 1000 meters if not provided.

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: Array of category names, provided as a comma-separated string.

200.description: Return all Brands, along with a count of all Places for each.

get.summary: Get all Brands from Places using Query params as filters

200.description: Return all Countries, as well as a count of all the Places and Brands in each.

get.summary: Get all Countries from Places using Query params as filters

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO 3166 country code consisting of 2 characters.

200.description: Return all Categories, along with a count of all Brands and Places for each

get.summary: Get all Categories from Places using Query params as filters

info.title: Overture Maps API Documentation
info.description: OpenAPI docs for the Overture Maps API

lat.description: Latitude coordinate. Required if country code is not provided.

lng.description: Longitude coordinate. Required if country code is not provided.

radius.description: Search radius in meters, defaulting to 1000 meters if not provided.

country.description: ISO 3166 country code consisting of 2 characters. Required if lat/lng are not provided.

limit.description: Limit on the number of results returned, defaulting to 100 if not provided.

brand_wikidata.description: Wikidata brand ID associated with the place.

brand_name.description: Brand name associated with the place.

min_confidence.description: Minimum confidence score for the places to be returned, defaulting to 0.5 if not provided.

categories.description: Array of category names, provided as a comma-separated string.

format.description: Response format, defaulting to JSON. Options are "json", "csv", or "geojson".

rules.description: Naming rules or variants associated with the place.

names.description: Names associated with the brand, usually Primary is the most useful

freeform.description: Full freeform address of the place.

record_id.description: Unique identifier for the record in the dataset.

rules.description: Naming rules or variants associated with the place.

socials.description: Social media links associated with the place.

phones.description: Phone numbers associated with the place.

version.description: Version number of the place data.

sources.description: Source information for the place data.

properties.description: Properties and additional details of the place.

country.description: ISO 3166 country code consisting of 2 characters. Required if lat/lng are not provided.

lat.description: Latitude coordinate. Required if country code is not provided.

lng.description: Longitude coordinate. Required if country code is not provided.

radius.description: Search radius in meters, defaulting to 1000 meters if not provided.

categories.description: Array of category names, provided as a comma-separated string.

places.description: Number of places in this Country

brands.description: Number of brands that are associated with the Country

country.description: The ISO code of the Country.

ext_counts.description: Counts related to the Country e.g. how many Places and Brands are associated with it

country.description: ISO 3166 country code consisting of 2 characters.

places.description: Number of places with this Category

brands.description: Number of brands that are associated with the Categorys

ext_counts.description: Counts related to the Category e.g. how many Places and Brands are associated with it
